mapper.insert: insert into employee_educations (employee_no, admission_date, school_name, mager_department, graduation_type, education_no) values (#{employeeNo}, #{admissionDate}, #{schoolName}, #{magerDepartment}, #{graduationType}, educations_seq.nextval)
mapper.select: select employee_no as employeeNo, admission_date as admissionDate, school_name as schoolName, mager_department as magerDepartment, graduation_type as graduationType, education_no as educationNo from employee_educations
